experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.desc: A 26 weeks long internship at Coolstuff, working on day-to-day tasks like writing new features, bug fixes, style tasks etc. and also on a larger, stand alone project. Working with Javascript, Svelte, TypeScript, graphQL, Jest, Cypress, version handling with Git/Github.

experiences.title: Researcher
experiences.desc: Headhunting, Executive Search and Professional Recruitment of managers and specialists in different sectors. Both national and international projects. Last 9 months I have been part of the Global Talent Acquisition Team with focus on Sweden.

experiences.title: Team Operation Coordinator
experiences.desc: Administrate and coordinate recruitment projects: handle invoices, communicate and arrange meetings, manage receipts and account coding of expense reports, team support.

experiences.title: Office Manager
experiences.desc: Interim office manager, working with reception, purchase, suppliers etc.

experiences.title: Staffing & Recruitment Assistant
experiences.desc: Team IT/Tech. Part time job during studies. Assist recruiters in their processes. Advertisement, selection, phone interviews, face-to-face interviews. Last 2-3 months full time.

experiences.title: ITC
experiences.desc: Responsible for the IT situation at the Sweden offices. Users, personal computers, purchase, networks etc. Worked 3 days a week as an interim.

experiences.title: Deli/Sales
